Balansio Smart is your personal self-care assistant. It allows you to set up health goals and tracks your progress along the way. It helps you to make healthy decisions, develop more consistent routines and achieve a healthier lifestyle.
Your personal health care assistant in your pocket.

Balansio Smart is highly automated to minimize interaction and to maximize results. You only need to set a goal once and keep tracking your health data with supported meters. The application follows your progress, adapts to your behavior and automatically suggests improvements to your goal configurations if necessary. Most importantly, it reminds you whenever you need to, or may have forgotten to keep track of your health.
